publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3742 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Northfield Girls—That the Parliament congratulates Emma Thomson, Lynsey White, Krista Cairns and Kimberley Ingles from Northfield in Aberdeen for their great achievement in winning first prize at the National Children and Young People’s Awards, sponsored by Kids Club Direct and Scottish Power Learning, in Glasgow on 10 December 2005 and recognises the excellent work carried out by the young girls who provide the Northfield Community Disco and play at various community venues on a voluntary basis.

S2M-3742 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Northfield Girls—That the Parliament congratulates Emma Thomson, Lynsey White, Krista Cairns and Kimberley Ingles from Northfield in Aberdeen for their great achievement in winning first prize at the National Children and Young People’s Awards, sponsored by Kids Club Direct and Scottish Power Learning, in Glasgow on 10 December 2005 and recognises the excellent work carried out by the young girls who provide the Northfield Community Disco and play at various community venues on a voluntary basis.
S2M-3742 Congratulations to Northfield Girls (lodged on 15 December 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Des McNulty*, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*, Stewart Stevenson*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-3742 Congratulations to Northfield Girls (lodged on 15 December 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-3742 Congratulations to Northfield Girls (lodged on 15 December 2005) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3742 Congratulations to Northfield Girls (lodged on 15 December 2005) Michael Matheson*
